Pinterest is a place of endless possibilities. You can:
- Discover everyday inspiration
- Shop styles you love
- Try and learn something new

Create boards, save Pins and make collages of all your inspiration. Unlock billions of ideas, from fashion tips and easy recipes to DIY projects and fresh ways to redo your space. Creating the life you love? 

It's Possible.

Glovo is the #1 app for ordering anything you want! With more than 240,000 restaurants & stores available, and delivery in minutes. Download the app now & order a Glovo!

Easily order food, groceries and gifts in your city without leaving home.

Want to order food straight to your door? Or get a grocery delivery of your essentials? We save you time, when you don’t have it. 

WHY USE GLOVO?

▶ Over 80 million downloads worldwide.
▶ Order in 23 countries including Spain, Portugal, Romania, Morocco, Italy, Poland, Croatia, Ukraine, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tunisia, Kenya, Uganda, Ivory Coast, Nigeria, Bulgaria, Serbia, Armenia, Bosnia-herzegovina, Montenegro, Moldova & Andorra.
▶ More than 240,000 restaurants, supermarkets and stores available globally.
▶ Deliveries from the biggest chains: McDonald's, Burger King, KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, Telepizza, Starbucks, Domino’s Pizza, Carrefour, PENNY., Eataly, Flying Tiger, Kiko Milano, Lafarmacia, Auchan, Decathlon, MediaMarkt and many more.
▶ Your favourite food delivery in minutes: Order burgers, pizza, chicken, kebab, pasta, sandwiches, sushi, poké…anything you want.
▶ Pay however you like. We accept PayPal, card payment, cash and even restaurant vouchers.
▶ Track your delivery or takeaway in real time and chat with our support team if need be.
▶ Subscribe to Glovo Prime and get unlimited free deliveries of food, groceries, and shopping. Save on every delivery! Available in selected countries.
▶ Invite your friends and earn money for each one who places an order on the app.

YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD, IN MINUTES!

Fancy a tasty dinner? Has it been a long day? You deserve to have your food delivered to your door! Or are you on your way somewhere? You can order food to take away and grab it on the go.

With Glovo, you can order up to 65 different types of food in your city. Including a burger from the most famous restaurants, to ordering from your favourite sushi place. There are more than 216,000 restaurants available worldwide for delivery or takeaway of your favourite food, in a matter of minutes.


GROCERY DELIVERY WITHOUT LEAVING HOME

Forget something from the supermarket? Got friends over and want to order another round of drinks or snacks? 

Now you can also order your groceries from the supermarket. Choose whatever you want from your favourite supermarket or local store and Glovo will deliver it to you in a few minutes. Food, snacks, drinks, something sweet, a missing ingredient... any groceries you need! 


THE APP TO ORDER ANYTHING

Glovo delivers everything. Find more than 27000 stores on the app, with all kinds of products. All your shopping on one app: surprise gifts, a last-minute purchase or whatever you need.

And if you need to send or pick up something in your city, Glovo can run errands for you. Choose a pick-up and delivery point and a courier will take care of the rest, with delivery in minutes!


NEED HELP? CONTACT US

If you’re looking for help with an order or have any questions about Glovo, please contact our support team via the support section in our app or on our website.

You can also find us on:
▶ Our site: https://glovoapp.com/ 
▶ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/glovoappES 
▶ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/glovo_es/ 
▶ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Glovo_ES

Download Glovo now! Order food, groceries, shopping or courier service - with delivery in minutes.

A professional app to help you manage your intelligent devices. 
•  Add new devices with a few easy steps
•  Control your device wherever you are 
•  Get the status of you devices in real time
•  Share your devices with friends and family members
•  Set up and perform intelligent tasks

【Mi Cloud Storage Automatic Renewal Service Description 】
- Renewal Service:7-day overwriting Renewal storage plan,30-day overwriting Renewal storage plan
- Renewal period:one month
- Renewal price: 7-day overwriting Renewal storage plan for 10 yuan/month, 30-day overwriting Renewal storage plan for 24 yuan/month
- Payment: after confirming the subscription, your Apple ID account will be debited;
- Cancel renewal:If you cancel the renewal, please manually turn off the automatic renewal function in the iTunes/AppleID settings management 24 hours before the current subscription period expires. Specific path:Please open the Apple mobile phone"settings"-->enter"iTunes store and AppStore"-->click"Apple ID",select"View Apple ID",enter the "Account Settings"page,click"subscribe",select Mi Cloud Storage unsubscribe. If you cancel within 24 hours before the expiration, the subscription fee will be charged;
- Renewal: Apple ID account will be deducted within 24 hours before expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period;
- Mi Cloud Storage Automatic Renewal Service Agreement: https://camera.api.io.mi.com/cloud-service/app/doc/auto_renew-en.html，
- Mi Cloud Storage User Agreement: https://camera.api.io.mi.com/cloud-service/app/doc/user_licence-en.html
- About Cloud Storage Automatic Renewal: https://camera.api.io.mi.com/cloud-service/app/my_cloud.html?channel=iosinfo&locale=en#/renew
- Terms of Use and User Agreement: https://g.home.mi.com/views/user-terms.html?locale=en&type=userLicense
- Privacy Policy: https://g.home.mi.com/views/user-terms.html?locale=en&type=userPrivacy

【HealthKit】
- Your record after each weighing: BMI (body mass index), body fat percentage, weight, lean body mass will be shared to Apple Health.

Njuškalo je najveći online oglasnik u Hrvatskoj, gdje milijuni prodavača i kupaca svakodnevno objavljuju oglase, pregledavaju ponude i uspješno trguju u kategorijama Auto Moto, Nekretnine, Marketplace, Turizam i Katalozi. Nikad lakše do kupnje ili prodaje stana, automobila i komada obuće ili odjeće kroz komunikaciju s prodavačima i putem PayProtect usluge! 

APLIKACIJA U BROJKAMA 
Naša aplikacija omogućava najbržu predaju i pretraživanje više od 2 milijuna aktivnih oglasa! Preuzeta je više od milijun puta, a svakog nam se dana pridružuju novi korisnici jer putem Njuškalo aplikacije mogu brže i lakše upravljati svojim oglasima te komunicirati s kupcima ili prodavačima. 

SVE ŠTO MOŽEŠ UZ APLIKACIJU 
- Jednostavno kupovati uz PayProtect, uslugu koja garantira sigurnu kupnju i brzu dostavu, a sve to iz udobnosti vlastitog doma 
- Brzo predavati oglase uz fotoprepoznavanje kategorije kojoj pripadaju i prijedlog prosječne cijene predmeta koji oglašavaš 
- Snimati 360° prikaze automobila te tako bolje prezentirati svoje automobile kupcima 
- Pretraživati i pregledavati oglase, uz jednostavan pregled nedavnih pretraga u tražilici ili na naslovnici aplikacije 

- Spremati zanimljive oglase i pretrage te primati notifikacije kada se pojavi novi oglas u sklopu spremljene pretrage 
- Uređivati svoje oglase u novom, još preglednijem sučelju 
- Kontaktirati prodavače bez napuštanja aplikacije 
- Uređivati svoje korisničke podatke 
- Uplaćivati sredstva na Saldo (karticom, uplatnicom, Paysafeom, SMS-om ili KEKS Pay-om) 
- Skočiti na vrh liste pomoću odlične istoimene funkcionalnosti 
- Postavljati oglase na istaknute pozicije (Vau Vau, Super Vau) 

- Surfati u dark mode načinu rada aplikacije 

KORISNIČKA PODRŠKA 

Za bilo kakva pitanja o načinu rada aplikacije ili pomoć pri trgovanju, možeš se javiti Njuškalo korisničkoj podršci unutar aplikacije ili putem kontakt obrasca: 
https://www.njuskalo.hr/index.php?ctl=contact 

Odgovore na često postavljena pitanja pronađi na linku: 
https://www.njuskalo.hr/?ctl=help&topic_id=1 

DRUŠTVENE MREŽE 

Želiš biti u korak s najnovijim informacijama? Prati nas na našim aktivnim Njuškalo društvenim mrežama: 

Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/njuskalo.hr  

LinkedIn – https://www.linkedin.com/company/njuskalo-hr/ 

Instagram – https://www.instagram.com/njuskalo.hr/  

YouTube –  https://www.youtube.com/@njuskalo  
 
Preuzmi besplatno Njuškalo aplikaciju i kreni trgovati u pokretu!

Floorcare
Enjoy effortless home cleaning with the Dyson robot or a cordless vacuum.

-	Schedule and track cleans, choose modes for each room, and set areas to avoid for your robot.
-	Learn how much dust your robot has removed and view scientific proof of a deep clean.
-	Access step-by-step guides for setup, troubleshooting, and maintenance to keep your Dyson cordless vacuum and wet floor cleaner in top condition.

Compatible with a wide range of Dyson floor care machines, including the Dyson 360 Vis Nav™ robot vacuum, V15™, V8™, V12™, Gen5detect™ vacuum cleaners, and the Wash G1™ wet cleaner.

Air treatment
Manage your Dyson air purifier, humidifier, and fan to take control of the air quality around you.

-	Control airflow speed, oscillation, Auto mode, Sleep timer, temperature, and humidity remotely.
-	Monitor air quality data to track your exposure to pollutants.
-	Gain insights into your home environment with monthly air quality reports.
-	Track filter life and receive alerts, to easily order replacements, ensuring your machine performs at its best.

Compatible with a wide range of Dyson purifiers, purifying fan heaters, purifying fans, and purifying humidifiers.

Hair care
Get the best out of your Dyson hair care device with the MyDyson™ app – your must-have companion for effortless and elevated styling.

-	Watch our styling guides to achieve your desired look with your hair dryer, multi-styler, and straightener.
-	Create your hair profile to get the best results with i.d. curl™ and for tailored content.
-	Set up your personalised curling routine to create perfect curls with your Airwrap i.d.™.
-	Elevate your skills with insider tips from celebrity stylists and our Beauty experts.

Connected features, such as i.d. curl™, are available with Airwrap i.d.™. The app also supports styling guides, tailored content, and hair profile for both Airwrap i.d™ and non-connected devices: Airwrap™, Supersonic™, Airstrait™, and Corrale™.

Audio
Get the app to enjoy the best audio experience with your Dyson headphones.
-	Cycle between Isolation mode, Transparency mode noise, and Off.
-	Choose from three equaliser presets to get your perfect sound.
-	Track your sound exposure or enable the safe volume limiter to look after your hearing.
-	Discover the full range of ear cushions and outer caps for your Dyson OnTrac™ headphones.

Compatible with Dyson OnTrac™ and Dyson Zone™ headphones.

Lighting
Transform your space with intelligent lighting that adapts to your lifestyle.

-	Adjust brightness and colour temperature settings to create your perfect environment.
-	Select a preset mode – Relax, Study, and Precision – to match your task, mood, or time of the day.
-	Set timers and schedules to automatically turn lights on or off.
-	Elevate your skills with insider tips from celebrity stylists and our Beauty experts.

Compatible with Dyson Solarcycle Morph™ desk and Dyson Solarcycle Morph™ floor.

More features

Build your smart home
Connect your Dyson product with Siri, Alexa, and Google Home for seamless integration.*

Get help
Speak to a Dyson Expert, explore user guides, and solve issues with our troubleshooting tool.

Be the first to find out
Get notified about special offers, launches, and events before anyone else.

Please note, some Dyson machines require a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi connection. Please check specific connection requirements on the Dyson website.
If you have any comments you’d like to share on the latest release, you can contact us directly at askdyson@dyson.co.uk.

*The functionality of Alexa, Siri, and Google Home may vary depending on the country and product.

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Privacy: https://www.gotinder.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.gotinder.com/terms
Visit: https://www.tinderlove.com/

Quickly and easily connect and control your smart home devices through SmartThings.
SmartThings is compatible with 100s of smart home brands. So you can control all of your smart home gadgets in one place, including your Samsung Smart TV and smart home appliances.
With SmartThings, you can connect, monitor and control multiple smart home devices quicker and easier. Connect your Samsung smart TVs, smart appliances, smart speakers and brands like Ring, Nest and Philips Hue - all from one app.
Then control your smart devices using voice assistants including Google Assistant

[Key Features]
- Control and check in on your home from wherever you are
- Connect your smart devices across many different brands to work together by setting ‘scenes’
- Build routines that are set on time, weather, and device status, so your home runs smoothly in the background
- Allow shared control by giving access to other users
- Receive status updates about your devices with automated notifications
- Talk to your devices using Google Assistant
- Track, monitor and save money on energy with SmartThings Energy. See how much your home and compatible Samsung devices cost to run, and try various energy saving features, such as AI saving mode, or schedule devices to run during off peak hours.
- Receive recipe recommendations by scanning meal kits, wine, and meat. Plan, shop and prep meals with the help of SmartThings Cooking 

※ Some features may not be available in all countries.

[App requirements]
Some mobile devices may not be supported.
- iOS 16.0 or later / iPhone 6s or later / iPad mini 4 or later

※ App permissions
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed. 

[Required access permissions]
-
 
[Optional access permissions]
• Bluetooth: to find nearby devices using Bluetooth or BLE
• Microphone: Used to set up ultrasonic sensor-equipped devices
• Camera: Scan QR codes.
• Location: to automate actions using GPS (GPS optional)
                    Used to find Wi-Fi information to add devices with iOS 13 or later versions
• Contacts: Used to verify user information that will be used when sending text messages

Welcome to the exciting world of Coca-Cola App! 

Quench your thirst with our range of refreshing beverages while unlocking a world of possibilities. Open the Coca-Cola App to start earning points and win prizes. Join our vibrant Coca-Cola community through our loyalty app and connect with fellow enthusiasts who share your passion. Whether you're a fan of Diet Coke, Coke Zero, the classic Original Coke, Fanta, Sprite and others we've got something special in store for you. Indulge in your favourite Coca-Cola beverage while exploring the vast array of rewards, and games tailored for you. 

Here are three compelling reasons why you should download and start using the loyalty Coca-Cola App today: 

 - Game Centre: Dive into a world of entertainment in our Game Centre, where you can engage in captivating and interactive game experiences. The Game Centre is your gateway to endless hours of amusement. You'll accumulate points that can be redeemed for instants wins, as well as entries into weekly or monthly raffle prize draws.

- Stay Up to Date: Browse the campaigns news to see what your favourite brand has in store for you. Don't miss out on the latest promotions and news by becoming a part of the Coca-Cola fan family today. Stay tuned for upcoming features that will further enhance your experience within the app. 

We value your feedback, so don't hesitate to visit the comments section and let us know what you'd like to see or suggest improvements for future updates. Your voice matters to us! 

Disclaimer: Please be aware that certain application features and competitions may vary from country to country. Join us today and let the spirit of Coca-Cola fuel your journey towards endless rewards and unforgettable Coca-Cola moments.

Ever get asked for recommendations? Benable is the all-in-one platform to share your favorite: products, places, activities, services, videos, recipes, and more!


THE RECOMMENDATION APP FOR EVERYONE

• Create lists of anything you love
• Discover millions of trusted recs
• Earn commission from 35,000+ brands 

HOW DOES IT WORK?
When you join Benable, you create beautiful shareable lists of things you love. Adding recommendations is super easy! You just add the name or link of your rec (e.g. a restaurant, a book, a product, etc.) and Benable will pull in all the info automatically to make a beautiful recommendation card - photos, links, and more!

HOW DO I SHARE MY LISTS?
Tap to share the link to your Benable profile and lists anywhere you want! Simply copy the link and send it to a friend, paste it in your bio, or add it to your blog. Your recs and profile can be viewed by anyone - people don’t need a Benable account.

WILL BENABLE HELP SPREAD MY CONTENT?
Yes! On the Discover pages, Trending page, in search results, and in people’s feeds. You’ll get frequent updates on what the Benable algorithm is looking for, and as you improve your Benable lists they’ll trend more and more across the platform and through SEO on the web. Over 1 million people browse Benable every month looking for trusted recommendations, and the Benable algorithm optimizes feeds for each person’s tastes!

35,000+ BRAND PARTNERS?
Yep! Benable has partnered with the world's biggest brands to help you monetize your recommendations. You get instant access to those brand partnerships as soon as you join! Whenever you add recommendations to your Benable lists, your recs will automatically be affiliate-linked. That means that whenever someone makes a purchase from your Benable lists, the brand partner will pay you a commission! Benable doesn't take a cent, you keep the full commission! You can then cash out on Venmo, Paypal, etc.

IS BENABLE JUST FOR PRODUCTS THEN?
Nope! You can literally recommend anything: restaurants you love, travel recs, articles, activities, resources, recipes, etc. If your recommendation is from a brand partner (e.g. product, hotel, etc) then it’ll get an affiliate link, but you can still recommend everything else!

HOW MUCH DOES BENABLE COST?
Benable is totally free! 

BENABLE IS ALL ABOUT AUTHENTICITY!
Benable is about real people, sharing genuine recommendations. Our algorithms reward the most authentic people and content across the platform, and our community is truly special. Benable brings together anyone who loves curation, finding and sharing great recommendations, and helping others!

KEY FEATURES:
• Recommend ANYTHING 
• Make lists public or private 
• Earn commissions from 35,000+ brands
• Opportunity for brand collabs and UGC
• Share your Benable content on other platforms
• Grow your audience through Benable 
• Full algorithm insights
• Personalized feeds & notifications
• Discover millions of genuine recommendations

Zoyya omogućuje jednostavno rezerviranje kod vašeg omiljenog pružatelja usluga (frizer, doktor, kozmetičar...) u nekoliko klikova, s podsjetnicima na termin putem e-maila ili SMS-a.


Istražite gdje su najbolje usluge u vašoj blizini, čitajte i ostavljajte recenzije te imajte potpunih pregled svih vaših prošlih i budućih termina.

Boost your dating confidence with Badoo— the dating app that makes it easy to express your true self.
 
It’s an encouraging, safe space that’s designed to help you make more meaningful connections.
 
How? By keeping it simple, helping you take action with confidence, and giving you the features and support you need to find whatever you’re searching for. Whether that’s dates, a long-term relationship, new friends, or chats.

Plus, with our latest tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, you can say hello to a fun and authentic dating experience. 
 
Download Badoo to take your dating confidence to another level."

Back yourself
On Badoo, it’s all about celebrating you and staying true to your needs. With our various features, it’s easy to put yourself out there with confidence.
Trust your experience
Badoo is a platform that prioritises authenticity. Profile photos can be verified and there are strict user guidelines in place.

How Badoo works
Focusing on who you are and what you want, here are some features making it easier for you to meet your kind of people:  
-Advanced Filters: Finesse your search, and save your time
-Profile Questions: Easily champion your personality
- People Nearby: Meet daters around you
- Encounters: Straight forward swiping, right to connect and left for skip
- Video Chat: Connect with your matches through face to face video calling
- Verified profiles: We have a three-step verification process which, once completed, you can choose to only interact with other verified profiles and find friends
- Blur intimate photos: Using AI, our Private Detector feature detects explicit photos and will let you decide if you want to view or block the image
- Deception Detector: Our new tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, so you can have a fun and authentic dating experience"

Go Premium
Maximise your dating experience. When you upgrade to Badoo Premium, you’ll unlock plenty of features that will make it even easier to find meaningful connections:

- See who's already liked you
- Find exactly what you’re looking for with unlimited Advanced Filters
- Get your messages read first
- Send unlimited likes
 - Control who sees your profile with Invisible Mode
- Undo accidental left swipes  
- And much more...

The price varies by country and may change without notice, but you can always see the exact price in the app. We will charge your card and your subscription will be automatically renewed unless you deactivate the automatic recharge a minimum of 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. Badoo Premium is flexible and adapts to your needs - you can cancel your subscription at any time.
 
For more information, read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://www.badoo.com/privacy
https://badoo.com/terms
 

Bumble Inc. is the parent company of Badoo, along with Bumble and Fruitz

Car Widgets: Style Dashboard brings your iPhone to life with beautiful CarPlay-style widgets and dashboards. Customize your CarPlay experience and make your car display as unique as your ride!

KEY FEATURES:

- CarPlay Widgets: Add sleek, car-inspired widgets to your iPhone and CarPlay dashboard.
- CarPlay Sounds: Choose from multiple connection sounds for your CarPlay. Get notifications about your phone.
- Custom Dashboard Designs: Choose from multiple themes, colors, and styles to match your car’s interior or your mood.
- Weather & Time Widgets: Get essential info at a glance with themed widgets that match your dashboard style.
- Fully Customizable: Adjust colors, layouts, and designs to create a personalized CarPlay interface.
- Subscription Features: Some premium widgets, themes, and customization options may be unlocked with a subscription.
- Safe & Private: All your widget data stays on your device — we never collect personal information.

WHY CHOOSE CAR WIDGETS: STYLE DASHBOARD:

Transform your CarPlay and iPhone experience with automotive-inspired design. Whether you’re a car enthusiast or just love customizing your digital dashboard, this app brings style, functionality, and personalization to your fingertips.

PERFECT FOR:

Car enthusiasts who love customizing their dashboard
Drivers who want quick access to info in a stylish format
Anyone looking to personalize their CarPlay or iPhone experience

HOW IT WORKS:
Open the app and browse available widgets and themes.
Customize your favorite dashboard layouts and designs.
Add widgets to your CarPlay or iPhone home screen.

Enjoy a unique, stylish dashboard that fits your car and lifestyle!

Experience CarPlay like never before! Download Car Widgets: Style Dashboard and make your iPhone dashboard truly yours.

Manage and monitor your smart home better and easier anytime from anywhere! This app works with home appliances and services from Hisense, Gorenje, ASKO & ATAG brands.
The app gives you the power to alter the world around you, just the way you like it. The ConnectLife app will adapt your smart home in a way that suits you from the minute you walk through the door. Set up specific tasks for your smart washing machine, control your smart refrigerator, check in with your smart dishwasher, and keep track of maintenance and update cycles for your smart air conditioning – all while you are on the go.

 

Smart wizards, tailored to registered appliances, will help you with your daily chores. No basic knowledge on cooking, washing, or cleaning is required, since wizards know the appliances and suggest optimal settings based on their characteristics and the desired outcome. With instant notifications, you will always know just what is going on in your home, no matter where you are. It is easy to create your own tasks tailored to your needs.

 

You cannot remember if you have closed the door of your smart refrigerator? No need to worry, just check in the ConnectLife app.
Do you have lots of laundry to do and do not want to miss a minute? Now you can easily monitor when your smart washer will finish your laundry.
You have no idea what to cook for dinner? Quickly scroll through the recipe section and get inspired with new recipes for your cooking.
Do you want a delicious dinner, perfectly baked and done, right on time when you come home? Simply control your smart oven from the app on the go.
Do you have problems with your connected appliances and do not know how to solve them? No need to panic, aftersales support is at your fingertips.
Smart home appliances work with Amazon Alexa that takes them to the next level with hands-free voice control.
Download now and alter the world around you with the new ConnectLife app.

To install the ConnectLife App, please make sure your iPhone is updated to iOS version 16.4 or later."

 

The functions offered in the ConnectLife app can vary depending on the specific type of appliance and the country in which you are using the appliance. Discover the ConnectLife app to see which functions are available to you.

 

Features:

 

Monitor: constant insight into your smart appliances’ statuses
Control: control your appliances anytime from anywhere
General: all about your appliances, at your fingertips
Recipes: many delicious recipes adjusted to functions & settings of your oven
Ticketing: aftersales support and FAQ at your fingertips

 

Brands: Hisense, Gorenje, ASKO, ATAG

Connect your IoT home appliances to the LG ThinQ app.
Enjoy effortless product control, smart care, and convenient automation in one simple solution.

■ Discover the convenience of smart home appliances through the Home tab.
 - Control your IoT home appliances from anywhere with our app.
 - Get personalized recommendations for managing appliances based on usage history.
 - Find out ways to better make use of the app's features from "Explore"
■ Upgrade your products from ThinQ Play.
 - Use your products more efficiently and with greater ease by introducing new features to products you are currently using.
 - Upgrade your products based on your lifestyle and personal preferences.
■ Monitor your energy consumption data quickly.
 - Use Energy Monitoring to compare your power usage with your neighbors’.
 - Set energy saving goals and get usage status notifications to help save energy more efficiently.
 - Receive care services for your products all in one place.
■ Handle everything from troubleshooting to service requests directly from the app.
 - Use the Smart Diagnosis function to check your product’s status.
 - Book a service visit from a professional engineer for an accurate diagnosis and inspection.
■ Conveniently reference LG home appliance manuals in one place.
 - Access a range of content, including function descriptions and essential usage solutions for products.

※ Services and features may vary depending on your product model and your country or region of residence.

The following access permissions are necessary for the ThinQ app. 
All the access permissions requested are optional access permission, so even if you do not allow them, you can still use the app except for the related services. (Including OS Request Permissions such as "Siri & Search", "Notification", "Background App Refresh", and "Cellular Data")

[Optional Access Permissions]
• Location
- To find and connect to nearby Wi-Fi when registering the product.
- To set and save the home location in Manage Home
- To search for and use information about current locations, such as weather.
- To check your current location in the "Smart Routines" function.

• Camera
- To take a profile picture
- To share a home or account scanned from a QR code.
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product..(미국 Only)
- To use the AI oven Cooking Record feature.
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information 

• Photo, Media, File
- To use the smartphone's storage when downloading the information of the product to be connected
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product.
- To view photo/video on your smartphone on the TV.
- To use in “Chat with LG” to save photos/videos of product symptoms or proof of purchase
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information

• Media and Apple Music
- To view photo/video on your smartphone on the TV.

• Microphone
- To check product status via Smart Diagnosis
- To use in “Chat with LG” when inputting through the microphone in the input window and using STT.

• Local Network
- To obtain the device connecting Wi-Fi info when adding devices

• Bluetooth
- To find and connect to nearby Bluetooth devices when adding a product to the app.

• HomeKit
- To add IoT-based products

• Notifications
- Notifications are essential for receiving updates on product status, important notices, benefits, and information.

The dating app bringing people closer to love

Bumble is the dating app where people meet, make connections, and start their love stories. We believe meaningful relationships are the foundation of a happy, healthy life — and we're here to help you find yours with a commitment to member safety and tools that empower confident dating.

Match with the right people, date, and find meaningful connection

Bumble is a free app for meeting singles and building connections grounded in mutual respect and trust. Whether you’re ready to find the one or date for fun, Bumble can help you connect with real people to build something authentic.

As champions of love, we prioritize creating a space where our members feel respected, confident, and empowered to make connections

- Our members are at the heart of everything we do
- We put safety first — so you can date with confidence, knowing you’re connecting with verified matches
- Respect, courage, and joy guide how we show up — and inspire others to do the same

Try our free features — built to make dating easier
- For better connections, conversations, and dates, personalize your profile with interests and prompts to showcase who you are, what you’re into, and what you’re looking for
- Trust that the person you’re talking to is real with ID Verification
- Feel confident with expert-backed dating advice designed to help you succeed
- See what music you bond over by linking your Spotify account
- Video chat and share your favorite pictures with your matches to get to know them better
- Chat with peace of mind — knowing that when you’re talking to new people, all messages must meet our community guidelines
- Get extra reassurance by sharing the details of your meetups with someone you trust
- If you’re ever in need of a dating break, hide your profile with the Snooze Mode (you'll still keep all your matches)

Want even more ways to connect? Bumble Premium unlocks extra features to boost your dating experience
- See everyone who likes you
- Use Advanced Filters like “What are they looking for?” to meet people who share your values, hobbies, and goals
- Rematch with expired connections — so you don’t miss out on a great potential date
- Browse anonymously with Incognito Mode and only seen by who you want to see you
- Extend your matches by 24 hours
- Swipe as much as you like to meet more people
- Tap into dating scenes around the world with Travel Mode
- Stand out and get noticed with free SuperSwipes & Spotlights, refreshed weekly

Inclusivity is key
At Bumble, we promise to support and include all forms of love: straight, gay, lesbian, queer, and beyond. We want everyone in our community to feel safe and welcome. So no matter how you identify, if you're looking for a place to chat, date, and find real love, we’ve got what you’re looking for.

---
Bumble is a free dating app to download and use. We offer optional subscription packages (Bumble Boost & Bumble Premium) and non-subscription, single, and multi-use paid features (Bumble Spotlight & Bumble SuperSwipe). Your personal data is securely processed in line with our privacy policy and applicable laws—be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions.

The hOn Smart Home app allows you to manage your connected appliances in an integrated and intuitive way, enabling a wide and surprising range of exclusive features and services, designed to revolutionise the way you experience your home.

Want to always have your smart home under control and at your fingertips, whilst optimising consumption and maximising performance?
All you need to do is install the hOn app!
You can explore free smart features, regardless of whether or not you own an appliance or follow the instructions to pair your new Smart appliances!**

Here's what the hOn app has to offer*:


・STAY CONNECTED:

Control and manage your appliances from your smartphone, at any time, always staying up to date with their consumption, status and activities.


・TAILORED SOLUTIONS:

Whether you are looking for performance, efficiency or customised solutions, the hOn app provides you with a wide range of smart features and specific programmes for every need.


・SMART WIDGETS:

Revolutionise your home management thanks to Smart Widgets, available to all hOn users; use the Recipe Book to cook professional recipes, the Stain Guide to wash your favourite garments, the Drink Assistant to enjoy your wine at the right temperature and finally, for lovers of four-legged friends, the Pet Care widget will assist you in keeping all activities regarding your pets under control.


・INVENTORIES:

The app allows you to manage your inventories:
- Catalogue your favourite wine bottles and discover all their secrets by activating the virtual wine cellar. Create your wine list, manage it and be inspired by the suggested pairings. 
- Scan and decode washing label symbols, store them in your virtual wardrobe and check them when needed.
- Manage your pantry by checking inventory and expiration dates.
- Store your purchase receipts in the virtual wallet and stay informed when the guarantee is about to expire.


・MAINTENANCE:

Keep your appliances’ performance constant over time, by activating maintenance operation reminders and launching specific self-test and check-up programmes.


・STATISTICS AND EFFICIENCY

Monitor your use routine and learn how to implement it, so as to optimise consumption and reduce waste. Automatically schedule your appliances to start in the time slots where the cost of energy is most affordable.


・DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT:

Download the manuals for your appliance and, if necessary, consult the FAQs, access wizards or contact the dedicated support for the resolution of doubts or problems.


・VOICE CONTROL:

Use voice commands to connect your Smart Home* through Smart Speakers*.
You can ask, for example, how much time is left to the end of cooking or start a washing programme!


----------------------------


Browse the hOn app and learn about countless other exciting features…

The hOn app has been designed and developed to ensure the upmost reliability and transparency in terms of privacy and security.

For this reason, should you need any help, please contact the Official Help Centre for the product purchased or write to us at: support.hon@haier-europe.com. We’re always at your disposal to give you a hand!

* The availability of some features may vary depending on the model, product and country. Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant are available in: Italian, English, French, German and Spanish.

** To guarantee all features, the app will ask you for access to your Camera, Gallery and Flash (profile photo and features), Microphone (voice commands), GPS location (to adjust your experience according to the country you are in), Wi-Fi and Bluetooth (to ensure you can control devices remotely)

Accessibility Statement: https://go.he.services/accessibility/hon-ios
